charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) &; 841(b)(1)(B) &; 18:2 Possess with intent to distribute a quantity exceeding 100 kilos, that is, approx. 156.8 kilos (345 lbs.) gross weight of marihuana (Date of Offense: 9/1/93) (Max. Penalty: 5 yrs Mandatory minimum to 40 yrs and/or $2,000,000 plus 4 yrs Mandatory SRT) (2)

charges.charge_disposition: CBOP 63 months on each count to run concurrently to each other, SRT 4 years w/o supervision if deported and conditioned on no unlawful return into the US, $100 special assessment (2)

charges.charge_description: 21:846, 841(a)(1) &; 841(b)(1)(B) Conspiracy to possess with intent to distribute a quantity exceeeding 100 kilos of marihuana (Date of Offense: 9/1/93) (Max. Penalty: 5 yrs Mandatory minimum to 40 yrs and/or $2,000,000, plus 4 yrs Mandatory SRT) (1)

charges.charge_disposition: CBOP 63 months on each count to run concurrently to each other, SRT 4 years w/o supervision if deported and conditioned on no unlawful return into the US, $100 special assessment (1)

charges.charge_disposition: CBOP 80 months, SRT 4 years, $50 special assessment (1)
